DataElement.preferredName: Diagnostic, Therapeutic, or Research Equipment Serial Number Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A unique identifier assigned a single unit of diagnostic, therapeutic or research equipment  used during a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Device Identifiers Domain Diagnostic, Therapeutic, or Research Equipment Serial Number
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to device identifiers._A manufactured object that is used to perform diagnostic, therapeutic or research activities._A unique identifier assigned to a member of a series of similar items.
